mapper.select: select hotel.*, ifnull(truncate(avg(review.star), 2), 0) as star from hotel left join review on hotel.hotelnumber = review.hotelnumber group by hotelnumber

select hotel.*, ifnull(truncate(avg(review.star), 2), 0) as star, truncate((6371*acos(cos(radians(37.500919))*cos(radians(hotel.latitude))*cos(radians(hotel.longitude) -radians(127.036578))+sin(radians(37.500919))*sin(radians(hotel.latitude)))), 2) as distance from hotel left join review on hotel.hotelnumber = review.hotelnumber group by hotelnumber having distance <= 5;
select hotel.*, ifnull(truncate(avg(review.star), 2), 0) as star from hotel left join review on hotel.hotelnumber = review.hotelnumber group by hotelnumber having hotelnumber=#{hotelnumber}

select hotel.*, ifnull(truncate(avg(review.star), 2), 0) as star, truncate((6371*acos(cos(radians(37.500919))*cos(radians(hotel.latitude))*cos(radians(hotel.longitude) -radians(127.036578))+sin(radians(37.500919))*sin(radians(hotel.latitude)))), 2) as distance from hotel left join review on hotel.hotelnumber = review.hotelnumber group by hotelnumber having hotelname like concat('%', #{hotelname}, '%') and distance <= 5;

select hotel.*, ifnull(truncate(avg(review.star), 2), 0) as star, truncate((6371*acos(cos(radians(37.500919))*cos(radians(hotel.latitude))*cos(radians(hotel.longitude) -radians(127.036578))+sin(radians(37.500919))*sin(radians(hotel.latitude))))) as distance from hotel left join review on hotel.hotelnumber = review.hotelnumber group by hotelnumber having hashid like concat('%', #{hashtag}, '%') and distance <= 5;
